trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an operation is attempted on a transaction that has already been rolled back, or an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction aborts.
trans-unit.target: 尝试对已返回，回滚的事务执行操作，或尝试提交事务，事务时引发的异常中止。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an action is attempted on a transaction that has already been rolled back, for example, when you attempt to call the <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> method on a transaction that has already timed out.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试对已回滚，例如，如果尝试以调用的事务进行的操作引发此异常<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A>对已超时的事务的方法。</xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This exception is also thrown when an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction aborts.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试提交事务而事务中止时，也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref>使用指定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含一条消息，说明发生异常的原因。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref>类，该类具有指定的序列化和流式处理上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>描述失败的序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>描述失败的序列化上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionAbortedException"></xref>使用指定的消息和内部异常的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含一条消息，说明发生异常的原因。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致当前异常的异常实例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
